laboratory_examinations.findings: Preoperative BMI = 47; Postoperative BMI after 12 months = 32.8; After additional weight loss at 18 months = 30; Weight at 2 years = 186 lb (BMI=30.9); Weight at 4 years = 205 lb (BMI=34.1).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: BMI decreased from 47 preoperatively to 30.8 at 12 months, further decreased to 30 at 18 months, then increased to 30.9 at 2 years, and finally to 34.1 at 4 years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normalized within several months after surgery.
